segments.text: Could you tell me please where can I find a currents exchange ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right here , how can i help you today , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to exchange 5000 Singapore dollars into the US dollars please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have an account this bank , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , here is my account number .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , here is my passport , by the way what is the rate today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Today's rate is 2.57 Singapore dollars for 1 US dollar , here is your money , sir.Please count it and sign your name here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is the credit demand.Where can I cash travellers ' cheques ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can cash them here , how much do you want to cash ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need 8 hundreds and the rest in 10s please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , have a nice day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , have a good day .
segments.speaker: S2
